lead_paragraph: Long before the Olympics, Kami Craig was just another homesick kid at her first travel water polo tournament. She called her mom, Dale, and mothers being who they are, she drove from Santa Barbara to Los Angeles to see her little girl.

headline.print_headline: Olympians Make Sure to Bring Special Items to Rio
headline.main: Olympians Make Sure to Bring Special Items to Rio
